sentences.sContent: Cookery means the knowledge of Medea and of Circe and of Helen and of the Queen of Sheba.
sentences.sCn: 烹饪术包含着美狄娅、瑟西、海伦和希巴女王的学问。

sentences.sContent: Among the characters Harry learns of is Circe , a powerful witch who turns men into pigs in one of the greatest stories ever told, The Odssey.
sentences.sCn: 哈利学习的人物之一是瑟茜，瑟茜是法力高强的女巫，能把人变成猪。她出现在最伟大的故事之一----《奥德赛》中。

trans.tranCn: 瑟茜（希腊神话女巫，有把人变成猪的法术）
trans.tranOther: an enchantress who detained Odysseus on her island and turned his men into swine
